metadata.subject: Concini, Concino, maréchal d'Ancre, approximately 1575-1617
metadata.title: La merveille royalle de Louys treisiesme, Roy de France & de Nauarre /
metadata.creator: M., M., sieur de
metadata.publisher: Paris, deuant la grand porte du Pallais, pres sainct Barthelemy, au Chapeau Royal : Chez Ioseph Guerreau, 1617
metadata.description: Coat of arms of Louis XIII on t.-p
Bookplate of Mr. von der Mulhen
André, Les sources de l'histoire de France, part III
Reference: Lindsay & Neu, French political pamphlets 1547-1648
Sonnet en forme d'epitaphe, sur le trespas du traistre Concino, à l'estranger passant; & Extraict du privilege du Roy: pp. 5-7 at end
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Text is lost in the binding or extends off of the edge of the page. Damaged, stained, marked, torn and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
